scale.description: We can override this to locally change the size of radius in the future if required.

XXS.description: SHARP. Validation bar on input components

S.description: MODERATE. Calendar asset (used in date components), Color picker advanced (inner swatch container), Dropdown select (menu container), File input (file uploads & integrated progress bar (bottom corners), Link preview, Tooltip.

M.description: GENTLE. Card select (single), Card select group (outer corners), Carousel (slides), File preview (File selector assets on left), Message, Note, Popover (menu container in Action popovers), Subscription tile (currently a pattern), Table (parent container), Tile & Tile flexbox (less rounded), Toast

L.description: SWEEPING. Carousel (parent container), Color picker advanced (parent container), Dialog (not full screen), File preview (parent container), Tile & Tile flexbox (more rounded).

circle.description: CIRCLE. Badge, Calendar date (today indicator), Loader bar, Portrait, Progress tracker, Step flow step indicators

XS.description: TIGHT. Checkbox (S, M), Link (focus background and underline)

S.description: MODERATE. Checkbox L, Date picker input, Date range input, Dropdown select (trigger), File input (draggable area), Link (focus bg and underline bottom-right and bottom-left), Menu (state bg shape), Search, Text area, Text editor, Text input

M.description: GENTLE. Button subtle, Card (less rounded), Menu (bottom corners), Navigation: left (state bg shape), Skip focus, Tab,

L.description: SWEEPING. Buttons S (typical and destructive, and inc bar, split and multi), Card (more rounded), Navigation left (collapsible Assets/Menu select top-right and bottom-right corners),

XL.description: CURVED. Buttons M (typical and destructive and inc bar split and multi), Button toggle M (parent container),

XXL.description: ROUNDED. Buttons L (typical and destructive and inc bar split and multi), Button toggle L (parent container),

circle.description: CIRCLE. Calendar date (selected), Carousel selector dots, Radio button, Switch

none.description: Button groups (internal/adjacent corners), Card select group (internal/adjacent corners), File input (integrated base bar top corners).
